attributes.action: Organ donation and blood for NHS hospitals only  Sign here
attributes.additional_details: Organ donation and blood for NHS hospitals only  Sign here if you would give blood or organs if it could be stipulated for use in NHS only. We Joe public give our blood and organs and then wait months to be treated for cancer. Meanwhile the privlaged ones on private health go straight to speedy boarding. Without us there all finished. Then when the elite start dying then the money will be found for the NHS toot sweet PROTO!!! If you consider a boycott also sign this petition
attributes.background: Read below also. The lack of money in the NHS can be resolved by the public. Without private hospitals the rich and elite would be clamoring to have the NHS fixed. Without our organs and blood there is no private medicine. Read further and sign

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
